text: Nejib Ben Khalfallah () (1967 â€“ 24 July 2020) was a Tunisian dancer and choreographer. He was born in Tunis, Tunisia. From 1993 to 2020, he directed and staged choreographic shows. His best known works were Mnema (2012), Jardin d'amour (2014), Thala mon amour (2016), and Fausse couche (2017). Khalfallah died on 24 July 2020 in Tunis. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Choreographers Category:Dancers Category:People from Tunis
title: Nejib Ben Khalfallah
